description: Provide seamless access to Omi conversations and memories through a standardized MCP interface. Enable users to read, create, and manage conversations and memories efficiently within their LLM workflows. Integrate easily with Claude, Cursor, and other MCP-compatible clients to enhance contextual understanding and interaction.

capabilities.name: read_omi_conversations
capabilities.description: Retrieves user conversations from Omi with pagination and filtering options

capabilities.name: read_omi_memories
capabilities.description: Retrieves user memories from Omi with pagination options

capabilities.name: create_omi_conversation
capabilities.description: Creates a new Omi conversation with text content and metadata

capabilities.name: create_omi_memories
capabilities.description: Creates Omi memories by extracting from text or using explicit memory objects
